links.title: Apple And Tesla Earnings In Focus As Nasdaq 100 Falls Into A Technical Correction
links.description: The Dow Jones, S&P 500, and Nasdaq 100 indices consolidated at the start of 2022, weighed by rising treasury yields and expectations that the Fed may kick off a rate-hiking cycle as early as March. US inflation hit a high of 7% in December.

body:
$SPY $TSLA $AAPL $AMZN $UVXY 

My thoughts on the week ahead  

One of the biggest mistakes I made back in 2020 was being bearish too long. Many of you who follow me remember me getting well ahead of the mkt crash in 2020. I was warning with multiple posts on ST about a market that was about to crash when the SPY was making all-time highs (SEE BELOW). But I fell into the same trap many will once again fall into this time around. Don't get me wrong, I feel the mkt has some more pain.  But, I've been shorting since the start of the year. And I play the bounces. The trap many will fall into is not realizing how strong short squeeze rallies can be. 

I spent the weekend putting together my Game Plan for the Week. I also wrote a blog titled " How do we know when we are at a bottom" . These are some very volatile times in the mkt but also some of the greatest opportunities. TSLA, AAPL, AMZN, UVXY - where are they headed. If  interested in joining, email me at

 jessielivermore1929@gmail.com
